mapper.sql: id, center_year, center_month, position_id, plan_type, plan_id, plan_item_id, equipment_type, equipment_id, sorting, status, is_del, remarks, create_by, create_at, update_by, update_at, version, small_type_code, middle_type_code, big_type_code, equipment_code, equipment_name, equipment_model, effect_code, equipment_factory
mapper.select: SELECT t1.id, t1.center_year, t1.center_month, t1.position_id, t1.plan_type, t1.plan_id, t1.plan_item_id, t1.equipment_type, t1.equipment_id, t1.sorting, t1.status, t1.is_del, t1.remarks, t1.create_by, t1.create_at, t1.update_by, t1.update_at, t1.version, t1.small_type_code, t1.middle_type_code, t1.big_type_code, t1.equipment_code, t1.equipment_name, t1.equipment_factory, item.equipment_num as equipmentNum, t1.equipment_model AS equipmentSpecification, item.specification_code as equipment_model, item.equipment_param_name AS equipmentParamName, item.equipment_param_value as equipmentParamValue, sb.code AS positionCode, type1.name as bigTypeName, type2.name as middleTypeName, type3.name as smallTypeName, t1.effect_code as effectName, item.effect_code as effect_code FROM el_plan_use t1 LEFT JOIN el_plan_item item ON t1.plan_item_id = item.item_id left join sb_type type1 on type1.code = t1.big_type_code left join sb_type type2 on type2.code = t1.middle_type_code left join sb_type type3 on type3.code = t1.small_type_code where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into el_plan_use (id, center_year, center_month, position_id, plan_type, plan_id, plan_item_id, equipment_type, equipment_id, sorting, status, is_del, remarks, create_by, create_at, update_by, update_at, version, small_type_code, middle_type_code, big_type_code, equipment_code, equipment_name, equipment_model, effect_code, equipment_factory) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{centerYear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{centerMonth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{positionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planItemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipmentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sorting,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{smallTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{middleTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bigTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipmentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipmentModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{effectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipmentFactory,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update el_plan_use
center_year = #{centerYear,jdbcType=INTEGER},
